Package org.cesecore.keybind.impl

Class OcspKeyBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.cesecore.keybind.InternalKeyBindingBase
        • org.cesecore.keybind.impl.OcspKeyBinding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IUpgradeableData, InternalKeyBinding
    public class OcspKeyBinding
extends InternalKeyBindingBase
    Holder of "external" (e.g. non-CA signing key) OCSP InternalKeyBinding properties.
    Version:
    $Id: OcspKeyBinding.java 25867 2017-05-17 16:18:06Z mikekushner $
